item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I am Shreeyash Pandey (Student, Final-Year CS Major). This page serves as a repository for my blogs (Technical or Non-Technical), projects, and more. My interest lies in Embedded Systems, Firmware Programming and Systems Programming. The region (albeit fuzzy) between hardware and software is the sweet spot for me. Being able to control and make an effect in real world is what attracts me to it. I would be delighted to collaborate on any projects or research related to my interests highlighted throughout the site.
